message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a little less.  I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11,000.
